    Google Cloud Platform Credentials

    Google Cloud Platform Credentials

    GoogleCloud.credentials — Module.

    Google Cloud Platform service-account API credentials.

    GoogleCloud.credentials.JSONCredentials — Type.
    JSONCredentials(...)

    Parse JSON credentials created for a service-account at Google Cloud Platform Console

    GoogleCloud.credentials.JSONCredentials — Method.
    JSONCredentials(data::Dict{Symbol, String})

    Initialise credentials from dictionary containing values.

    GoogleCloud.credentials.JSONCredentials — Method.
    JSONCredentials(filename)

    Load credentials from a JSON file.

    GoogleCloud.credentials.MetadataCredentials — Type.

    Get credential/service-account information from GCE metadata server

    See Storing and Retreiving Instance Metadata
